DOC.brief_title: L-Arginine Antioxidant Vitamins During Pregnancy Reduce Preeclampsia
DOC.detailed_description: Preeclampsia syndrome unknown origin characterize hypertension , edema proteinuria . It usually appear third trimester occur frequently primigravidas . Preeclampsia may complicate life-threatening condition include seizure , severe hepatic dysfunction , renal failure coagulopathy ; one lead cause maternal morbidity mortality worldwide . Preeclampsia cite lead cause maternal death survey maternal mortality Mexico ( 25 % maternal death ) . Specific Aim 1 . To assess efficacy L-arginine supplementation antioxidant vitamin deliver medical food reduce incidence preeclampsia high-risk population . Two group receive food ( bar ) either antioxidant vitamin alone without vitamin order test impact vitamin supplement prevention preeclampsia . The primary hypothesis test supplemental L-arginine combination antioxidant vitamins significantly reduce preeclampsia ( hypertension proteinuria ) complication high-risk population ( woman whose blood pressure > 140/90 20 week gestation without proteinuria ) . Secondary hypothesis test include antioxidant vitamin supplementation contributes reduction preeclampsia ; supplemental L-arginine antioxidant vitamin improve neonatal outcome ( reduce incidence prematurity intrauterine growth retardation ) ; preeclampsia correlate inversely plasma L-arginine level , directly plasma level endogenous NO synthase inhibitor , asymmetric dimethyl arginine ( ADMA ) , inversely urinary NO metabolite , marker endogenous NO production ; preeclampsia inversely correlated maternal plasma level antioxidant vitamin .
DOC.criteria: Previous pregnancy complicate preeclampsia/eclampsia Singleton pregnancy Gestational age > 20 week < 34 week Protein excretion < 300 mg/day Multiple gestation Major fetal anomaly Preexisting hypertension Preexisting renal disease Diabetes Collagen vascular disease Cancer strong family history cancer first degree relative Preexisting maternal disease require medication
